name: Mr. Jack's Christmas Delivery
description:
It's finally Christmas time, garlands, fireplaces, snow, everything is in place to spend a good Christmas .... Except the gifts, the gifts are missing! How is it possible, a Christmas without gifts, it's a disaster! 

You have to go up at full speed on your sled to save Christmas by distributing as many gifts as possible through the chimneys. But be careful not to miss too many chimneys or you won't be able to save Christmas.

Controls Team Members 

• Robin Moreux in Fourth year - Producer

• Simon Dejean in Fourth year - Game Designer

• Nino Barbier in Second year - Game Designer

• Ayoub Ouahid in Second year - Game Designer

• Paul Leduc in Fourth year - Developper

• Thomas Raulin in Second year - Developper

• Téo Sautereau in Second year - Developper

• Merri Le Chevanton in Fourth year - Artist

• Marc-Amaury Fauris in Second year - Artist

Mr. Jack's Christmas Delivery is a game produced in 72 hours during the Christmas Unreal Jam 2021 by 9 IIM students (Y4 and Y2 students). 

With as theme the movie Nightmare Before Christmas by Henry Selick.
